title: Bungie Layoffs, Delays, & Is PlayStation GAAS in Trouble? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 10.31.23
description:
This episode is sponsored by BetterHelp — go to http://betterhelp.com/kindafunny to get 10% off your first month.

Greg and Blessing talk Bungie Layoffs, Marathon and Destiny 2's expansion getting delayed, big Remedy updates, and a HUGE news day.
